title: Modeling a Periodic Context-Tire, Part A

content.question: Part A ​​The graph of <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> and its dashed midline for two full cycles is shown. skill.text: Skill 2.B: Construct equivalent graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations of functions that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context, with and without technology.
